name: Read BBC Urdu in Jameel Noori Nastaleeq font
description:
Read BBC Urdu in Jameel Noori Nastaleeq font. For this style to work, you will have to download and install Jameel Noori Nastaleeq font first from here: http://urdu.ca/1
Follow the instructions on the link mentioned above.
additional_info: This style is based on "Calibri my sites" from b0mbrman.
